short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multi-window vertical tab manager. save and restore tabs & windows with auto-saver. Never forget why this tab left open?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ“¢ Tab and window manager, organize your tabs with notes, cloud sync.

ğŸ“Œ Why you should consider this:
âœª Multi-window UI design.
âœª window-merger
âœª Set window's title.
âœª Switch  window in one click (Alt + S).
âœª Filter tabs & remove duplicates.
âœª Fuzzy search & sort tabs
âœª Save and restore tab groups.
âœª Add note for tab opening reason.
âœª Dark mode.
âœª Cross-devices sync.
âœª Pure & clean code that powers fastest performance.
âœª No third-party library used.
âœª Negligible memory consumption.
âœª No tracking.

ğŸ“Œ == FEATURES ==
âœ… Long-waited window manager:
 Only window manager that let you set title of windows. 
Convert your window into a web page and share & collaborate on it.
 Do you feel bored while moving a one-one tab from one window to another? We feel same that's why we created - window merger. 
You can move all tabs from one to another in one click.

âœ…Never Lose your important windows:
 Save windows and its tabs in one click. When you restore saved windows, newly added tab will auto-save.

âœ… Handy Drag and Drop ui:
 Multi-window ui helps you to move tabs from one window to another quickly. Drag and drop tab from saved window to restore it. Drag and drop tab to saved window to save it.

âœ… Custom tab manager that solve your clutter: 
Save and close tabs in one click then later restore it.

âœ´ï¸ FILTER TABS:
â‡’ Filter by domain: Close all same domain tabs in one click.
â‡’ Filter by group: Close all same group tabs in one click.
â‡’ Remove duplicates : Remove all duplicates tab in one click.

âœ´ï¸ SORT TABS:
â‡’ Domain: Sort and organize tabs according to its domain.
â‡’ Title: Sort and organize tabs according to its title.
â‡’ Group:Sort and organize tabs according to its group.

âœ… More tab manager Features:
âœ´ï¸ Add reason: Add reason on tab for- why i left opened this tab?
âœ´ï¸ Save tab:Save your important tabs and access on any devices.
âœ´ï¸ Suspend tab:Dramatically reduce memory usage and keep your computer running faster.

âœ… Supercharge native tabgroups:
 Whenever you close browser, you lose all grouping and you need to manually restore it. Don't worry, we fix this issue, all groups will be automatically restored. Wait wait !! even more we do:

âœ¤ Group creation: Create a group of selected tabs in one click.
âœ¤ Filter by groups: Filter tabs by its groups.
âœ¤ Sort tabs:Sort tabs according to its group's title.

âœ… Cross-devices sync and cloud backups: 
Sync your tabs between computers to keep your work organized, no matter how many devices you use or where they are.
